lead_paragraph: The Keeping Score column last Sunday, about the worthiness of admitting a designated hitter into the National Baseball Hall of Fame, misspelled, in some editions, the surname of a writer who has evaluated historical baseball statistics. He is Dan Szymborski, not Syzmborski.
